title: Land For Sale In Boralesgamuwa
details:
How to pay ..

Reserve your land lot by paying Rs.250000/- (amount should be changed in different lands)
Pay 40% of land value with in 14 days.
And balance can be paid through a bank or department loan arranged by us, on installment basis up to period of 20 years.
Or pay Interest Free within 3 months from reservation.
Attractive discounts on outright settlements.
Or pay installment basis on unique 'FAIR LANDS' easy payment scheme up to 5 years.
